definition[0]: the 16th letter of the English alphabet
definition[1]: the written abbreviation of  provisional, used on cars to show that the driver is a learner and has a provisional licence
definition[2]: the abbreviation of penny or pence
definition[3]: used in written music to show that a part should be played or sung quietly
definition[4]: written abbreviation for PENNY or PENCE
example[1]: Shares opened at 47.12p but soon rose to 56p.
definition[6]: in Britain, the letter that is combined with a number to refer to different documents used by the INLAND REVENUE. For example, a P60 is a form given by an employer to an employee which shows the employee’s pay, tax, and National Insurance payments for that year
